Unknown.translation: A burnt out coal when held in hand blackens it but causes burns when held if burning. (Coal is problematic both when cold or burning)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: jIkUM TMFw kolw h`Q nwl PVIey qwˆ Es nUM klw kr is`tdw hY, Aru jykr eyh q`qy nUM prsy Cohy qwˆ prdgD pRdgD kr idMdw BlI pRkwr swV idAw krdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: kUkr ky cwtq klyvrih lwgY Coiq; kwtq srIr pIr DIr n Drq hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as dog's lick is contagious and causes unbearable pain when it bites. (Dogs lick and bite both are troublesome).

lines.gurmukhi: PUtq ijau gwgir prq hI pKwn pir; pwhn priq puin gwgir hrq hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as a pitcher breaks when dropped on a stone, and it also breaks when stone drops on it. (A stone is destroyer of a pitcher in every way).

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy hI AswD sMig pRIq hU ibroD buro; lok prlok duK doK n trq hY [388[

Unknown.translation: So is developing loving relationship with evil-minded persons. Loving him or showing dissent towards him is equally bad. Thus one cannot escape from pain and sufferings of this world and the world hereafter.  (388)
